externalDocs.description: Find out more about Pollination Cloud.

tags.name: Model
tags.description:
Models includes geometrical information as well as materials, constructions,
and boundary conditions to describe a simulation model for daylight and energy
and CFD modeling.

tags.name: Sensor Grid
tags.description: Sensor Grid is a collection of sensors for grid-based studies.

tags.name: Simulation
tags.description:
Simulation in Pollination is an executable recipe which has a set of predefined
instruction to execute specfic set of commands. In the near future all the recipes
in Ladybug Tools plugins will be available as Pollination simulations.

tags.name: Workflow
tags.description:
Workflow is a collection of usually interrelated simulations. Simulations will be
executed in steps or in parallel based on interdependencies between simulations.

Sensor.title: Sensor
Sensor.description:
A single sensor.

    The first 3 values indicate the location and the second 3 valuse indicate the
    direction of the sensor.

ModelOut.description: Face by Face Model Schema Out

faces.title: Faces
faces.description: List of model faces, can be of type Face or ShadeFace

latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: Location latitude between `-90` and `90`. Default is `0`.

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: Location longitude between `-180` (west) and `180` (east). Default is `0`.

time_zone.title: Time_Zone
time_zone.description: Time zone between `-12` hours (west) and `12` hours (east). Default is `0`.

elevation.title: Elevation
elevation.description: A number for elevation of the location. Default is `0`.

RadianceParameters.title: RadianceParameters

base.title: Base
base.description: Base input value to set the initial parameters. The default value is set to `default` which will use Radiance default parameters. Other options are `low`, `medium` and `high`.

overwrite.title: Overwrite
overwrite.description: An optional string of Radiance parameters to overwrite base values. e.g. `"-aa 0.01 -ad 4800"`

RadianceParameters.description:
Parameters for Radiance-based simulations.
    You can use base to set the values based on preset values and then use overwrite to
    overwrite custom parameters.

month.title: Month
month.description: A value for month between `1`-`12`. Default is `1`.

day.title: Day
day.description: A value for day between `1`-`31`. Default is `1`.

hour.title: Hour
hour.description: A value for hour between `0`-`23`. Default is `0`.

minute.title: Minute
minute.description: A value for month between `0`-`59`. Default is `0`.

is_leap_year.title: Is_Leap_Year
is_leap_year.description: A boolean to indicate if datetime is for a leap year. Default is `false`.
